meanings.definition: A type of Icelandic dairy product, similar to yogurt.
meanings.sent1: I had some delicious skyr for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She bought a tub of skyr from the store.
meanings.sent3: The skyr was so creamy, it felt like eating a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her love for skyr was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The tangy flavor of skyr lingered on his taste buds.

meanings.sent1: I skyr my lunch every day.
meanings.sent2: They decided to skyr a healthy snack.
meanings.sent3: He skyrred his way through the buffet, trying everything.
meanings.sent4: She skyrred up the last piece of cake in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The children eagerly skyrred the ice cream on a hot day.

meanings.sent1: The skyr dessert was light and refreshing.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed the skyr smoothie after their workout.
meanings.sent3: The skyr cheesecake was a guilt-free treat.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt as smooth as skyr after using the lotion.
meanings.sent5: The skyr pancakes were fluffy and satisfying.
